effect_entries.effect: Records the number of times the trainer's Pokémon have jumped in the Pokéathlon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer's Pokémon have jumped in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケスロンの　記録が　はいっている。
ポケモンの　ジャンプした　回数が
記録された　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon jumped in the Pokéathlon.

Contiene i tuoi dati Pokéathlon.
Su questa Scheda è registrato il numero di salti
dei tuoi Pokémon.

Contiene los datos del Pokéathlon con el número
de veces que has cambiado de Pokémon.

Speichert deine Pokéathlon-Rekorde. Die Karte
zeigt, wie oft du gesprungen bist.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre de sauts
de vos Pokémon.

포켓슬론의 기록이 들어 있다.
포켓몬이 점프한 횟수가
기록된 카드.

ポケスロンの　きろくが　はいっている。
ポケモンの　ジャンプした　かいすうが
きろくされた　カード。

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have jumped.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have jumped.

Contient vos données du Pokéathlon.
Sur cette carte est inscrit le nombre
de sauts de vos Pokémon.

It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a
card that shows how many times your
Pokémon have jumped.
